title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple pull/run workflow.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama server; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models via Python.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM & embeddings components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting and generating with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models as inline Copilot replacements.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, dependency injection helpers.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) for running Ollama server containerized.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: FastAPI service providing RAG endpoints using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake adding Ollama package and NixOS module; merged into nixpkgs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger CI module that exposes Ollama containers for pipeline LLM steps.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library with GenServer behaviour for streaming Ollama completions.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama featuring chat, generate, embed, and model ops.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama with allocator-aware JSON parsing and streaming.
